Package project.controllers.repository

Interface I_SingleRepositoryController<T extends I_RepositoryItem>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of object the repository stores.
All Superinterfaces:
I_RepositoryController<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AppointmentRepositoryController, DrugRepositoryController
public interface I_SingleRepositoryController<T extends I_RepositoryItem>
extends I_RepositoryController<T>
Defines the functions of an object that controls interactions concerning a repository.

  • Method Details

    • getFileName

      java.lang.String getFileName()
      Returns:
      the _fileName variable. Represents the file that stores the repository contents.

    • getRepository

      Repository getRepository()
      Returns:
      the content of the _repository variable. Represents the repository that holds the data.

    • setRepository

      void setRepository​(Repository repository)
      Parameters:
      repository - the new repository to replace the repository in the _repository variable.
